title: Add navigation-to-places links for Goa (and any destination)

requirements.text: Add a new ‚Äúüó∫Ô∏è Maps & Navigation‚Äù section to the Trip Plan overview that helps users reach must-visit places for the trip destination (e.g., Goa) by providing external map links for each place.

acceptanceCriteria: On the Trip Plan page (TripPlanPage ‚Üí Overview ‚Üí TripPlanView), a clearly labeled section named ‚ÄúMaps & Navigation‚Äù is visible when the trip has one or more must-visit places.
The section lists each item from the existing Must-Visit Places list and includes an ‚ÄúOpen in Maps‚Äù action per place.
Clicking ‚ÄúOpen in Maps‚Äù opens a new browser tab to a maps website search for that place name combined with the trip destination (e.g., "Basilica of Bom Jesus, Goa"), using a URL-encoded query.
User-facing text in the new section is in English.

requirements.text: Add a ‚ÄúView destination in Maps‚Äù action near the trip destination header that opens an external map search centered on the trip destination (e.g., Goa).

quotes: i need the maps that if i reached to goa some of the visiting places that should be reached

acceptanceCriteria: TripPlanView shows a ‚ÄúView destination in Maps‚Äù action near the destination display in the hero/header area.
Clicking the action opens a new browser tab to a maps website search for the trip destination using a URL-encoded query.
The feature works for any destination string stored on the trip (not only Goa).

constraints: Do not implement an embedded interactive map, geolocation, or GPS features; use external map links only.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; no new backend services/databases.
nonGoals: Integrating third-party map SDKs (Google Maps JS SDK, Mapbox GL, etc.).
Automatically calculating routes, distances, or travel time within the app.
